src:
Frank Lampard Sebarkan Kabar Baik Soal Kondisi N'Golo Kante
01 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - N'Golo Kante tak kunjung menghiasi lini tengah Chelsea. Seperti yang diketahui, gelandang berkebangsaan Prancis itu harus menepi cukup lama karena mengalami cedera.
Laga kontra Southampton dalam ajang Premier League awal bulan Oktober lalu menjadi kali terakhir Kante terlihat di atas lapangan. Ia membukukan satu gol dan membantu the Blues meraih kemenangan dengan skor telak 4-1.
Sebelum itu, Kante telah berulang kali absen karena masalah cedera. Namun karena perannya yang sangat dibutuhkan, Frank Lampard selaku pelatih mau tak mau memainkannya meski tahu bahwa kondisinya belum sepenuhnya pulih.
Belakangan, Chelsea seperti sudah terbiasa tanpa kehadiran pria berumur 28 tahun itu. Performa Mateo Kovacic dan Jorginho dalam formasi 4-2-3-1 milik Lampard nampaknya sudah cukup dirasa memuaskan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Frank Lampard Spread the Good News about the Condition of N'Golo Kante
Nov 01 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
N'Golo Kante has never graced Chelsea's midfield. As is known, the French midfielder had to pull over long enough because of injury.
The match against Southampton in the Premier League last October was the last time Kante was seen on the field. He recorded a goal and helped the Blues win with a landslide score of 4-1.
Before that, Kante had been repeatedly absent due to injury problems. But because of his much-needed role, Frank Lampard as the coach could not help playing despite knowing that his condition had not fully recovered.
Later, Chelsea seemed to have become accustomed to without the presence of the 28-year-old man. Mateo Kovacic and Jorginho's performance in Lampard's 4-2-3-1 formation seems to be quite satisfying.

Scroll down to read full information.
